name: Shooter Looter Scooter
description:
In many games the hero fires so many bullets that you would assume that there's some cart full of ammo following them around.

In this game that's actually what's happening.

Controls:

  • click = fire
  • right click or space = reload
  • arrows = movement
  • m = toggle the music

Sound is from jsfxr, which is an excellent jam tool.

Music is "Overworld", "Space Fighter Loop" from Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
